Workflow.Name: [SharePoint] Get Folders
Workflow.Description:
Uses the Service Account to retrieve the list of Teams that a specific user is a part of.
This is used by SharePointAttachFilePopUp.html to populate the list of folders the user can upload files to in Sharepoint.

Description.description:
Uses the Service Account to retrieve the list of Teams that a specific user is a part of.
This is used by SharePointAttachFilePopUp.html to populate the list of folders the user can upload files to in Sharepoint.
